sait.bms.managers

Class RetailManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.bms.managers.RetailManager

  • public class RetailManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Description: Has 6 main options for Appdriver to run off: 1.Display menu, 2.Checkout Book, 3.Find Books by Title, 4.Display Books by Type, 5.Produce Random Book List, 6.Save file & Exit

      • displayMenu

        public void displayMenu()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Displays the selection
        Throws:

      • bookCheckOut

        public void bookCheckOut(java.lang.String isbn,
                         java.util.ArrayList<Books> bookList)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        bookCheckout() : A user inputs an isbn number into the system and is returned whether the book is available or not. If it is available, they receive all the information (toString()) about the book, and the availability decrements by one.
        Parameters:
        isbn - isbn number the user is looking for
        bookList - array list of all books in the library
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws any exceptions when working with the books file

      • titleSearch

        public void titleSearch()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a input string from the user and prints book(s) with titles matching that string.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws any exceptions when working with the books file

      • typeSearch

        private void typeSearch()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Asks the user to choose what type of book they want to search. Based on the type of the. Book the user has to choose the category they want to search within that type.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws any exceptions when working with the books file

      • randomBooks

        public void randomBooks()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Gets a input amount from the user and prints the specified amount of random books.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws any exceptions when working with the books file

        private void loadBooksFromFile()
                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException

        Throws:

        private void programExit()
                  throws java.io.IOException
